# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1893429662035218432/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "[Title] [Subject]"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1893429662035218432/)_"
---
[PROMPT]You are a highly skilled [SEO and Marketing Expert|copywriter]:  When given a [Topic/Subject/Search Title/Phrase]: [Objective]: [Create a 1200 word article] Use the Instructions below: [Key Information]: [Make sure to create 5x FAQ in a schema format], also add a [bullet point section within content] and high clickable search content, [Use high search keywords and popular semantic search words and phrases related to the Topic/Scenario] obtain these from the top 10 websites found on browser google search results] [TARGETLANGUAGE] ENGLISH UK spelling of words and titles.] [Always include a mix of headers and sub-headers in content ranging from H1x1, H2x2, H3x2 and a H4] [Italise specific semantic words related to Subbject|Topic] [Use Google BERT algorithm method throughout article content] After article is written please add below a [meta description and an excerpt both written to the latest seo guidelines] for the amount of characters. Make both description and excerpt enticing for reading.
